Package org.red5.io.utils

Class Summary
ArrayUtils  
BufferUtils Buffer Utility class which reads/writes intergers to the input/output buffer
DOM2Writer This class is a utility to serialize a DOM node as XML.
HexCharset This was borrowed from the Soupdragon base64 library.
HexDump Hexadecimal byte dumper
IOUtils Miscellaneous I/O utility methods
ObjectMap<K,V> Map that should be transmitted as object through RTMP.
RandomGUID  
Stax2DomBuilder Builds a DOM Document using a XMLStreamReader.
XMLUtils Misc XML utils
